text:
Bergen Street, at the N.W. corner of Albany Ave., showing a view of the Commercial High School.
About 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

Bergen Street, east from Albany Avenue. Note the old trolley barns on the left.

March 29, 1932

P. L. Sperr

(2)

The same, at a later date. The car barns have been abandoned.

September 12, 1940

P. L. Sperr

Bergen Street, east from Albany Avenue. Note the old trolley barns on the left.

March 29, 1932

P. L. Sperr

(2)

The same, at a later date. The car barns have been abandoned.

September 12, 1940

P. L. Sperr

original_title: Brooklyn: Albany Avenue - St. Mark's Avenue
text:
Albany Avenue, east side, between St. Marks Avenue and Bergen Street, showing two old frame dwellings. The clearance is fifty feet wide, between numbers 169 and 159 Albany Avenue.

September 13, 1940

P. L. Sperr
